songs.title: Chak Glass
songs.lyrics:
Tu, aaja tu sade kol
Kyon tarphanve sanu hun
Sanu tere dil di lor, lor, lor, lor

Ronh, akhian raatin haye ronh
Tenu yaad karke saujaun
Sanu tere dil di lor, lor, lor

Hai patli patang vargi
Jerhi charheyan di seene aag laave
Sanu eh tu sohni lagdi
Jiven sohna lagda eh Punjab eh
Tere husan da koi na jawab

Hai patli patang vargi
Jerhi charheyan di seene aag laave
Sanu eh tu sohni lagdi
Jiven sohna lagda eh Punjab eh
Tere husan da koi na jawab veh

Chak glass te kal tan na tu vekh
Nachke tu hun thumke deh
Rajkeh aaish ve karde ne
Punjabi munde hai

Chak glass te kal tan na tu vekh
Nachke tu hun thumke deh
Rajkeh aaish ve karde ne
Punjabi munde hai

Hun, tu nakhre naa vakha
Pharle bottle mu naal laa
Chaa tha khol ke dhamaalan paa, paa, paa, paa
Naa, dil naina nu naa pharha
Ehna chakran vich naa aa
Sacha pyar koi nai karda, da, da

Hai patli patang vargi
Jerhi charheyan di seene aag laave
Sanu eh tu sohni lagdi
Jiven sohna lagda eh Punjab eh
Tere husan da koi na jawab

Hai patli patang vargi
Jerhi charheyan di seene aag laave
Sanu eh tu sohni lagdi
Jiven sohna lagda eh Punjab eh
Tere husan da koi na jawab veh

Chak glass te kal tan na tu vekh
Nachke tu hun thumke deh
Rajkeh aaish ve karde ne
Punjabi munde hai

Chak glass te kal tan na tu vekh
Nachke tu hun thumke deh
Rajkeh aaish ve karde ne
Punjabi munde hai

Hey banawa tenu apni jaan banawa tenu apni heer banawa
Tenu kutke seene naal utu lutawann to pyar da
Tenu kabhi vi na chaat keh mein jaava
24/7 tere naal vah
Menu tere huseya luteyah
Pair toh te marne aah

Chak glass te kal tan na tu vekh
Nachke tu hun thumke deh
Rajkeh aaish ve karde ne
Punjabi munde hai

Chak glass te kal tan na tu vekh
Nachke tu hun thumke deh
Rajkeh aaish ve karde ne
Punjabi munde hai

Chak glass te kal tan na tu vekh
Nachke tu hun thumke deh
Rajkeh aaish ve karde ne
Punjabi munde hai

Chak glass te kal tan na tu vekh
Nachke tu hun thumke deh
Rajkeh aaish ve kardiya ne
Punjabi kuriya veh

P-P-Punjabi

P-P-Punjabi

P-P-Punjabi

Punjabi munde ne
